Be Fashion”. Get ready to experience the world of elegance and beauty; the world of ethnics, with Fashion Parade. If you have the fire in you, this is the right place to be." "Footfall of 3000+, over 50,000 watts of music, Stars performing live on stage and a string of passionate music lovers in the crowd. A lifetime experience that you cannot afford to miss." "As they say “Beauty with brain is an absolutely deadly combination”, we believe: “A chivalrous knight is equally lethal”. So join in and prove your mettle to get hold of the most coveted title of the fiesta." "Is there a Kapil Sharma in you? Or is it Ellen Degeneres? Whoever it is. Get ready to put it upfront at HassRath-The Laughter Chariot. The stage is open for any kind of comedy. Language barrier is a thing of past, Comedy is what we ask for." BrixxActivity The YMCA University of Science and Technology, Faridabad erstwhile YMCA Institute Of Engineering, was established as a joint venture of the National Council of YMCAs of India, Govt of Haryana, and the Central Agencies for Development Aid, Bonn, Germany.YMCAUST has been awarded 'AAA+' by the Career360 Magazine in the year 2013, 2014 and 2015. YMCA University has also been accrediated with 'A' grade by NAAC. Our University has been mandated to affiliate 50+ B.Tech and B.Ed institutions.
To all Lara Crofts and Indiana Jones out there, there is a new treasure in town. Where? It is up to you to find. Hidden in the depths of the Internet, do not lose trail while following or you might get lost forever. 

 Xunbao is a multi-level contest where you will be given cues to solve. 

 With every step challenging your wit, it is a race against time and fellows. So get on your Black Pearls, in other words your Mobile and surf the waves on the internet to claim your fame. 

 This year the stakes could not get any higher. Conquerors of the event will get prizes like Mi Band 2 and more exciting goodies. 

 To all the smarty pants out there who think they can win by cheating, don't even try because every move you make we'll be watching you! Adoption of wrong means (asking or telling answers to other players, handing over the clue to another players) shall lead to immediate disqualification! 

 GOOD LUCK EXPLORING! 


Rules :-> 
 1. All the answers are to be submitted in lowercase only. 
 2. Date format is DD/MM/YYY. E.g.- 12/05/2018. 
 3. 24-hour format is HH/MM/SS. E.g.- 19/45/15.
Elements Culmyca, the annual inter college cultech festival of YMCAUST has grown on to become one of the most popular college festivals of NCR. With 1000+ participating students, 40+ participating colleges and an expected footfall of over 10000, ELEMENTS CULMYCA 18 guarantees to be a sure hit The upcoming 'Kalakaars' painting the entire college in the colours of their vivacity, the gaming freaks, the coding addicts. They are all a part of the same institution, busy doing what they do best.
